001package org.consensusj.analytics.util.collector;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Collections;
005import java.util.List;
006
007/**
008 * An immutable implementation of {@link LargestSliceList}.
009 */
010public final class LargestSliceListImpl<E, N extends Number & Comparable<? super N>> implements LargestSliceList<E,N> {
011    private final List<E> list;
012    private final N totalOther;
013
014    public LargestSliceListImpl(List<E> list, N totalOther) {
015        this.list = Collections.unmodifiableList(new ArrayList<>(list));
016        this.totalOther = totalOther;
017    }
018    
019    @Override
020    public List<E> getSliceList() {
021        return list;
022    }
023
024
025    @Override
026    public N getTotalOther() {
027        return totalOther;
028    }
029}
